
const events = require("events");
const emitter = new events.EventEmitter();

class AutoKill {
    constructor(client) {
        this.client = client;
    }
async enable() {
    if(!this.client) {
throw new Error('Provide the Client!')
    }
    let AntiKillClient = this.client;

    setInterval(async () => {
        if(!AntiKillClient.user || !AntiKillClient) {
                await process.kill(1);
                console.log(`Killed The Process!`)
            } else {
                return;
            }
        }, 60000)
    }
    }



    module.exports = { AutoKill }
